name: Maera Public Works
description:
The random theme generator gave me "flood," so here's a five puzzle game about waterway maintenance. Possibly also inspired by the water dungeons in all the Zelda games I've been replaying recently.

Keyboard controls: arrow keys or WASD to move, push blocks, and bump switches; [Z] to undo moves; [R] to reset

Touchscreen controls: tap at the main menu; swipe to move, push blocks, and bump switches; open the tab menu in the upper left to undo moves and reset

Hackable version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=e3eb8a58787f1ac88cb37b6dbc5a292b
